snippet.title: Hedon Release Trailer - It's Classic
snippet.description:
Coming on March 21st:
Steam - https://store.steampowered.com/app/1072150/Hedon
itch.io - https://zanthebonebreaker.itch.io/hedon
IndieDB - https://www.indiedb.com/games/hedon

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/hedon

Music: Alexander Brandon - Heavy

It took almost two years and a half of intense work, but we're finally here. Ladies and gentlemen, I present you Hedon's first installment and release! Tons of thanks to everyone who helped me along the way, the testers, the Patreon supporters, the bands and artists who pitched in for this project and everyone who gave an opinion regarding Hedon. You're all awesome!
